subject: Football
Hurricane Katrina
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Ridge Turner passed for two touchdowns and ran for three more as South Plaquemines High School defeated West St. John, 48-8, on Saturday for the Louisiana Class 1A state title.
snippet: Quarterback Ridge Turner passed for two touchdowns and ran for three more as South Plaquemines High School defeated West St. John, 48-8, on Saturday for the Louisiana Class 1A state title.
